name: Exit Popups
author: thesinginglark

sections.description:
You can make unlimited exit popups in wordpress Exit Popups post type editor.

In front end, you can just use shortcode [exitpopups id=”1″] to inser it to any posts.

When users exit the post, they will see the exit popup box.

Download

https://github.com/thesinginglark/exit-popups
sections.installation:
1:Upload the Exit Popups plugin to your blog
2:Activate it
3:In Exit Popups menu, you can add new Exit Popups
4:Just insert shortcode [exitpopups id=”1″] to any posts
3:That’s all
